sections.description: Display Floating Buttons on your WordPress front-end. Based on work by Faraz Quazi.
sections.installation: Click the activate button and that's it.
sections.changelog:
v1.0 released on June 6, 2024

  • Feature: Free for everyone. Unlimited buttons and display filters.

v1.0.1 released on June 10, 2024

  • Improvement: Add settings link to plugin page.
  • Improvement: Clean up old code from previous plugin development
  • Moved select2 to enqueue
  • Revised code for popup buttons
  • Fix snapcode generator
  • Fix color picker popup

v1.0.2 released on June 11, 2024

  • Update API
